title: ESOP-in-a-Box™
subtitle: The Complete Employee Ownership Transition Platform
excerpt: Automated, compliant pathway from owner succession planning to closed ESOP transaction—purpose-built for Baby Boomer business exits
aboutText: ESOP-in-a-Box revolutionizes how business owners transition to employee ownership. Unlike traditional ESOP advisory that requires months of consultations and extensive manual processes, our platform provides a turnkey, largely automated solution. We guide you from initial feasibility exploration through transaction close and ongoing plan operations, ensuring compliance at every step while dramatically reducing time and complexity.

children.text: Our AI-powered analysis conducts comprehensive due diligence, evaluating your company's financial health, ownership structure, and ESOP suitability. Receive repurchase liability projections, preliminary valuation ranges, and a customized readiness report within days.

Navigate complex tax and corporate decisions with intelligent guidance. We analyze C-corp vs S-corp elections, Section 1042 tax deferral eligibility, and leveraged ESOP transaction modeling with multiple scenarios tailored to your situation.

Access multiple funding pathways through our integrated lending network including SBA 7(a) and 504 programs, senior debt, mezzanine financing, and seller note structuring with automated lender matching and proposal coordination.

Execute the ESOP transaction with blockchain-enhanced transparency. Smart-contract tokens mirror cap table and vesting schedules while shares transfer to the ESOP trust with a full audit trail and real-time compliance verification.

Comprehensive post-transaction administration including automated participant allocations, annual valuations, 409(p) testing for S-corps, distribution processing, and DOL/IRS compliance monitoring through our platform.
